thread.title: Foreigner killed during hijacking in Krugersdorp
thread.title_full: Foreigner killed during hijacking in Krugersdorp | News24

author: news24.com
title: Foreigner killed during hijacking in Krugersdorp
text:
Johannesburg - A Nigerian man has been shot and killed in a fight during a hijacking in Krugersdorp, west of Johannesburg.
The 52-year-old man was shot in his head around 20:00 on Monday when a fight between him and six hijacking suspects broke out in Sivewright Street, Krugersdorp, police spokesperson Constable Tshepiso Mashale said.
"The victim was shot and the suspects drove away with the deceasedâ€™s vehicle [a silver Corsa]," she said.
She urged witnesses to assist the police in their investigations.
